game.name: The Good Dog: Chasing Shadows
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In The Good Dog: Chasing Shadows, play as a dog defending your family from paranormal creatures. Explore the world and solve environmental puzzles to save your loved ones and uncover the mystery.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In The Good Dog: Chasing Shadows, play as a dog defending your family from paranormal creatures. Explore the world and solve environmental puzzles to save your loved ones and uncover the mystery.
